platform.rest
Class PlatformClient

java.lang.Object
  platform.rest.PlatformClient

public class PlatformClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to access to the fundamental resources of the Platform

Author:
Ivan Corredor

getInstance

public static PlatformClient getInstance()
Returns:
Current instantiation of the Platform client. If any instantiation has been perfomermed previously, the server IP will be set up to the default IP (10.1.10.212:6008)
